resources.string: Make a gesture to call a contact
Starts the application when the device boots to enable notification icon

just tried gesture call, and I like it ! You can call or text your contacts with a simple gesture on the screen. Get it here:
Post a comment on facebook to recomend Gesture Call to your friends
Put a post in your wall to recomend Gesture Call to your friends
Close app after the call or sms
Puts an icon in the notification area to access the app from anywhere.
Number of seconds to wait before calling or opening the messages board.
Choose main style for the app. 5 themes available: grey, blue, green, black and white
If you want Gesture Call in your language or are willing to help us improve with any idea, please tap here to send us and e-mail.
Do you really want to send a SMS to
Support us downloading Gesture Call Donate without advertising you will receive actualizations before!

f you want to support us you can download Gesture Call Donate without advertising and you receive updates a bit earlier than the normal version. New interface, send messages quickly and the new notifiación icon. click on the image:
In Acdroid love to develop applications for Android and not only have Gesture Call.
Create a shortcut to launch Gesture Call for quick access from the descktop
The first that we recomend is that configure gesture call bla bla bla
To activate the notification bar icon press the menu on your phone and then click settings
Do you really want to exit?
Do you really want to call
Do not show this message again
This is the first time you use Gesture Call\n....
The gesture has not been recognized
Long click on an item to edit its options
Could not load %s. Make sure you have a mounted SD card.
Fatal error. Gesture Library not found!
When making a gesture, it will require confirmation before calling

AND TO YOU FOR DOWNLOADING\n 
GESTURE CALL AND DONATE\n 
THANX!! 
 
 
 \n\n\n

- Gesture Call -\n 
\n 
Thanx you very much for downloading Gesture Call\n\n 
 
◘ Version 2.0.6\n\n 
• Bug Fix. 
• Changes in the Ads. 
• Added Share on Facebook.\n\n 
 
◘ Version 2.0.5\n\n 
• Added button 'No' to the before call dialog.\n 
• Change default theme to Blue.\n 
• Fix a problem in the Wellcome dialog.\n 
• Reduced the size of the application.\n 
• Improvements in the interface.\n 
• Fix a bug in the ads when there aren't a network.\n\n 
 
◘ Version 2.0.4\n\n 
• Solved a important bug.\n 
• Fix languages.\n 
• Important improvements in the interface.\n 
• Change Ads Company.\n\n 
 
◘ Version 2.0.1\n\n 
• In the preferences screen now return button save the preferences.\n 
• Fix languages and complete italian.\n 
• To activate the notification bar icon press the menu on your phone and then click settings.\n\n 
 
◘ Version 2.0\n\n 
• New Interface\n 
• Differents Themes\n 
• Now You can Send SMS\n 
• New Options:\n 
 New Notification for quick access\n 
 Exit after call\n 
 Auto call after wait a few seconds\n 
 Default action (Call or SMS)\n 
• Now you can create a shortcut\n 
• New method to contact with the developers\n 
 (send us feedback, ideas, bugs … )\n 
• Bug Fix 
\n\n 
 
◘ Version 1.2.2\n\n 
• Now you can create a shortcut of Gesture Call\n 
 (In the options menu press the Shortcut option)\n 
• Min bug fix \n\n 
 
 
◘ Version 1.2.1\n\n 
• New Languages\n 
 Russian\n 
 Korean\n 
• New button Donate\n 
• Interface improvements\n 
• New method to contact with the developers\n 
 (send us feedback, ideas, bugs … )\n 
• Bug fix\n 
 
\n\n\n 
 
\n\n\n
